short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks out youtube suggestions!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View this extension as a simple tool for productivity. I personally struggled with keeping up with YouTube suggestions during work. So I just developed this simple extension to block the homepage and suggested videos.
